PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2017-05812017-06-02,  ,  ,  ,  GAC
ActOther Than Statutory Authority
SubjectMultilateral Convention to Implement Tax Treaty Related Measures
PrecisOrder authorizing the Minister of Foreign Affairs to sign, or to delegate powers to sign, on behalf of the Government of Canada, to sign and to BRING INTO FORCE the MULTILATERAL CONVENTION TO IMPLEMENT TAX TREATY RELATED MEASURES TO PREVENT BASE EROSION AND PROFIT SHIFTING to implement the base erosion and profit shifting tax treaty related minimum standards and a provision on arbitration.
AttachmentsAttachment
